How do you effectively play a Megacorp? : r/Stellaris
results.p: Megacorps are built around playing nice and getting lots of commercial pacts (unless you're criminal). Even militarist megacorps want trade partners.
Mar 22, 2023 — Going to try a megacorp for the first time in a very long time, and was curious what everyone likes to build theirs like, and how they like ...
MegaCorp is an expansion pack for Stellaris: Console Edition, which has players ushering in an era of prosperity and profit on a galactic scale.
